alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 9:04AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Duck Creek and possibly the lower portions of the Little Muskingum River remain in flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 901 AM EDT, flood waters will continue to recede through late morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Marietta, Williamstown, Lower Salem and Devola. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
